turns.user_message: Need to schedule a doctor visit soon.
turns.assistant_message: Hello Kwame. For your emergency health concern, would you prefer an in-person appointment at MedCare Clinic or a telemedicine option?

turns.user_message: Both options are valid; I'll have to consider my current health status.
turns.assistant_message: Understood. What's the nature of your health concern? This will help determine the most appropriate appointment type.

hidden_states.inner_thoughts: I need to assess the urgency of the situation and my preferences.

satisfaction.explanation: The question is straightforward, but I need to decide on the appointment type quickly.

turns.user_message: I want to convey my situation efficiently.

satisfaction.explanation: Offering both the direct number and appointment times is comprehensive and facilitates prompt action.

user_profile.name: Kwame Nkrumah
user_profile.description: Kwame Nkrumah is a 62-year-old retired engineer who values thoroughness and detail in all aspects of life. With advanced technical skills and a formal communication style, he approaches tasks, such as scheduling a doctor visit, with analytical precision, ensuring he considers all necessary details under the pressure of a mobile environment. His decision-making is intuitive yet cautious, reflecting his risk-averse nature and experience in navigating complex situations with patience and adaptability.

instructions.dialogue: Be brief and direct, give minimal information.
instructions.profile: Only share profile information when specifically asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express minimal emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Emergency health concerns requiring immediate attention
additional_requirements: Support for telemedicine options if in-person visit is not feasible
